import React from 'react'; import { Chart as ChartJS, CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, ArcElement, PointElement, LineElement, } from 'chart.js'; import { Bar, Doughnut, Line } from 'react-chartjs-2'; import Card from '../UI/Card'; import { TrendingUp, Users, Clock, CheckCircle, AlertCircle, XCircle } from 'lucide-react'; ChartJS.register( CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, ArcElement, PointElement, LineElement ); const ProjectAnalytics = ({ analytics, projectName, isLoading = false }) => { if (isLoading) { return (
{[1, 2, 3, 4].map((i) => (

))}
); } if (!analytics) { return (

No analytics data available

Analytics will appear here once tasks are created

); } // Prepare data for charts const taskStatusData = { labels: ['Completed', 'In Progress', 'To Do', 'Blocked'], datasets: [ { data: [ analytics.completed_tasks || 0, analytics.in_progress_tasks || 0, analytics.todo_tasks || 0, analytics.blocked_tasks || 0, ], backgroundColor: [ '#10b981', // Green for completed '#3b82f6', // Blue for in progress '#f59e0b', // Yellow for todo '#ef4444', // Red for blocked ], borderColor: [ '#059669', '#2563eb', '#d97706', '#dc2626', ], borderWidth: 2, hoverOffset: 4, }, ], }; const priorityData = { labels: ['High', 'Medium', 'Low'], datasets: [ { data: [ analytics.high_priority_tasks || 0, analytics.medium_priority_tasks || 0, analytics.low_priority_tasks || 0, ], backgroundColor: [ '#ef4444', // Red for high '#f59e0b', // Yellow for medium '#10b981', // Green for low ], borderColor: [ '#dc2626', '#d97706', '#059669', ], borderWidth: 2, hoverOffset: 4, }, ], }; const progressData = { labels: ['Week 1', 'Week 2', 'Week 3', 'Week 4'], datasets: [ { label: 'Tasks Completed', data: [12, 19, 8, 15], // This would come from backend borderColor: '#3b82f6', backgroundColor: 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1)', tension: 0.4, fill: true, }, { label: 'Tasks Created', data: [15, 25, 12, 20], borderColor: '#10b981', backgroundColor: 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1)', tension: 0.4, fill: true, }, ], }; const chartOptions = { responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom', labels: { padding: 20, usePointStyle: true, }, }, tooltip: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)', titleColor: 'white', bodyColor: 'white', borderColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)', borderWidth: 1, }, }, }; const doughnutOptions = { ...chartOptions, cutout: '60%', plugins: { ...chartOptions.plugins, legend: { position: 'right', labels: { padding: 20, usePointStyle: true, }, }, }, }; return (
{/* Header */}

{projectName ? `${projectName} Analytics` : 'Project Analytics'}

Comprehensive insights and performance metrics

{/* Stats Cards */}

Total Tasks

{analytics.total_tasks || 0}

Completed

{analytics.completed_tasks || 0}

In Progress

{analytics.in_progress_tasks || 0}

Completion Rate

{analytics.total_tasks > 0 ? Math.round((analytics.completed_tasks / analytics.total_tasks) * 100) : 0}%

{/* Charts */}
{/* Task Status Distribution */}

Task Status Distribution

 {/* Priority Distribution */}

Priority Distribution

 {/* Progress Over Time */}

Progress Over Time
{/* Additional Metrics */}
Avg. Task Duration

3.2 days
Overdue Tasks

{analytics.overdue_tasks || 0}
Team Members

{analytics.team_members || 0}
); }; export default ProjectAnalytics;
